languages.text: Every time the Overseer's ability is used, both the Overseer and the Pet receive +1 Deflection until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Every time the Overseer's ability is used, both the Overseer and the Pet receive +1 Deflection until the end of combat. Stacks.

languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the Overseer and their familiar gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

Суммируется.

Este efecto es acumulativo.
